item.title: Omg plzzzzzzzzzzzz
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

Search for

public int untradable[]
Above that add

public boolean singleWild() { if((absX >= 3067 && absX <= 3122 && absY >= 3520 && absY <= 3706)) return true; else return false; }
Then search for

case 73: //Attack (Wilderness)

In that case look for

inCombat();

Under that add

if(plz.attackingPlayerId != playerId && plz.attackingPlayerId != 0 && singleWild() && plz.singleWild()) { sendMessage("You cannot attack a player that is already in combat!"); attackingPlayerId = 0; ResetAttack(); break;
Next Search for

public void AttackMage(int index)

In that look for

attackingPlayerId = castOnPlayer.playerId;

Under that add

if(castOnPlayer.attackingPlayerId != playerId && castOnPlayer.attackingPlayerId != 0 && singleWild() && castOnPlayer.singleWild()) { sendMessage("You cannot attack a player that is already in combat!"); spellID = 0; } else { castOnPlayer.attackingPlayerId = playerId; }
and your done
That makes edge
Wild lvls 1-14 1v1 pking ONLY

Read full topic
